title: Official Blind Review #1
review_assessment:_thoroughness_in_paper: I read the paper at least twice and used my best judgement in assessing the paper.
review:
This paper proposed two constrains to tackle the problems of dead points and dead neurons. In the toy datasets,  these two problems are successfully solved. In addition, the network weights can be initialized naively with the proposed method.

Pros:
- The idea sounds interesting. Dead points and dead neurons are solved in the toy examples.
- Networks can be initialized with zeros with the proposed idea.

Cons:
- The experiments are not sufficient to validate the arguments.  MNIST and CIFAR-10 datasets are toy datasets. As the memory complexity is reasonable, Experiments should be done on ImageNet.
- Why aren't the constrains 12 and 13 in the final objective 16? Am I missing something?
- Too many typos.
